title: The Angel Who Pawned Her Harp (1954, Comedy) Diane Cilento | Colorized Movie | Subtitles

sources.title: The Angel Who Pawned Her Harp (1954, Comedy) Diane Cilento | Colorized Movie | Subtitles
sources.description:
An angel arrives in Islington in London on a goodwill mission to soften the heart of pawnbroker who specialises in old musical instruments. The angel shows people the path down which their happiness lies.

Original title: The Angel Who Pawned Her Harp (1954)
Black & White version: https://youtu.be/jOBuOkxz3hk

Director: Alan Bromly
Writers: Charles Terrot, Sidney Cole
Stars: Diane Cilento, Felix Aylmer, Robert Eddison
Genres: Comedy, Fantasy

00:00:00 Full Movie
00:01:17 Down to earth 
00:15:01 Going to the dance
00:18:44 End of the evening kiss
00:27:27 At the greyhound races
00:31:21 Attempted mugging
